00025                 protected function check_auth()
00026                 {
00027                         if (!Login::is_logged_in())
00028                         {
00029                                 $_SESSION['redirect_to'] = array('controller' => $this->name, 'action' => $this->action);
00030                                 $this->flash('Login is required to access the page you requested!', 'warning');
00031                                 $this->redirect_to(array('controller' => 'login'));
00032                         }
00033                 }

00039                 protected function log_visit()
00040                 {
00041                         $visit = new Visit();
00042                         $visit->save();
00043                 }
00044 
00049                 protected function block_ip()
00050                 {
00051                         if (BlockedIp::is_blocked($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']))
00052                         {
00053                                 $bv = new BlockedVisit();
00054                                 $bv->save();
00055                                 die(l('Sorry, your IP address is currently blacklisted'));
00056                         }
00057                 }

00063                 protected function add_acronyms()
00064                 {
00065                         $acronyms = array('URI' => 'Uniform Resource Identifier',
00066                                 'URL' => 'Uniform Resource Locator',
00067                                 'CSS' => 'Cascading Style Sheets',
00068                                 'JSP' => 'JavaServer Pages',
00069                                 'XML' => 'eXtensible Markup Language',
00070                                 'SMS' => 'Short Message System',
00071                                 'JSF' => 'JavaServer Faces',
00072                                 'HTTP' => 'HyperText Transfer Protocol',
00073                                 'GWT' => 'Google Web Toolkit');
00074                         $patterns = array();
00075                         $replacements = array();
00076                         foreach ($acronyms as $acronym => $explanation)
00077                         {
00078                                 $expl = h($explanation);
00079                                 $patterns[] = "/([^_\-a-z0-9])($acronym)([^_\-a-z0-9])/i";
00080                                 $replacements[] = "$1<acronym title=\"$expl\">$2</acronym>$3";
00081                         }
00082                         $this->response->body = preg_replace($patterns,
00083                                 $replacements,
00084                                 $this->response->body);
00085                 }
00086                 
00091                 protected function morse_encode()
00092                 {
00093                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00094                                 array(
00095                                         "/-->/",
00096                                         "/\/\*/",
00097                                         "/\*\//",
00098                                         "/>([^<]*)</e",
00099                                         "/(alt|title|content)=\"([^\"]*)\"/e",
00100                                         "/§§§/",
00101                                         "/###/",
00102                                         "/%%%/",
00103                                 ),
00104                                 array(
00105                                         "§§§",
00106                                         "###",
00107                                         "%%%",
00108                                         "'>'.Morse::encode('\\1').'<'",
00109                                         "'\\1=\"'.Morse::encode('\\2').'\"'",
00110                                         "-->",
00111                                         "/*",
00112                                         "*/",
00113                                 ), 
00114                                 $this->response->body);
00115                 }
00116 
00121                 protected function shrink_html()
00122                 {
00123                         return;
00124                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00125                                 array(
00126                                         "/\s+|\n/",
00127                                         "/>\s+</",
00128                                         "/> <(\/?)(p|link|meta|div|h|body|title|script|style|!--|ul|ol|li|dl|dd|dt|option|th|td|tr|table|tbody|thead|tfoot)/",
00129                                         "/<(p|link|meta|div|h|body|title|script|style|!--|ul|ol|li|dl|dd|dt|option|th|td|tr|table|tbody|thead|tfoot)([^>]*)> </",
00130                                 ),
00131                                 array(
00132                                         ' ',
00133                                         '> <',
00134                                         '><\1\2',
00135                                         '<\1\2><',
00136                                 ), 
00137                                 $this->response->body);
00138                 }
00139                 
00146                 protected function sanskrit_ambra()
00147                 {
00148                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00149                                 array(
00150                                         "/&([^;]+);/",
00151                                         "/>([^<]*)</e",
00152                                         "/<&([^;]+);>/",
00153                                 ),
00154                                 array(
00155                                         "<&\\1;>",
00156                                         "'>'.Sanskrit::encode('\\1').'<'",
00157                                         "&\\1;",
00158                                 ), 
00159                                 $this->response->body);
00160                 }

00170                 protected function load_part_contents($filename)
00171                 {
00172                         $localized_filename = @preg_replace("/\.([^\.]+)$/",
00173                                 "-{$_COOKIE['hl']}.\\1",
00174                                 $filename);
00175                         if (file_exists($localized_filename))
00176                         {
00177                                 $contents = file_get_contents($localized_filename);
00178                         }
00179                         else
00180                         {
00181                                 if (!file_exists($filename))
00182                                 {
00183                                         HTTP::error(500);
00184                                 }
00185                                 $contents = file_get_contents($filename);
00186                         }
00187                         return $this->strip_external_php_tags($contents);
00188                 }
00189                 
00197                 protected function include_localized($filename)
00198                 {
00199                         $localized_filename = @preg_replace("/\.([^\.]+)$/",
00200                                 "-{$_COOKIE['hl']}.\\1",
00201                                 $filename);
00202                         if (file_exists($localized_filename))
00203                         {
00204                                 include($localized_filename);
00205                         }
00206                         else
00207                         {
00208                                 if (!file_exists($filename))
00209                                 {
00210                                         HTTP::error(500);
00211                                 }
00212                                 include($filename);
